description: This file defines a Flutter widget for a processing screen within a menu image generator application. It manages the UI for displaying the progress of menu processing tasks, including stages such as OCR extraction, parsing, image generation, and displaying results. It also handles navigation and user interactions for cancelling or viewing results after processing completes.

classes.name: ProcessingArgs
classes.description: An immutable class used to pass arguments, specifically an image data URL, to the ProcessingScreen during navigation.

classes.name: ProcessingScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that manages and displays the progress of menu processing stages, handling user interactions and navigation upon completion or cancellation.

methods.name: ProcessingScreen.createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state associated with this widget.

methods.name: _ProcessingScreenState.didChangeDependencies
methods.description: Initializes processing by extracting arguments and starting the orchestrator after the first build.

methods.name: _ProcessingScreenState.build
methods.description: Builds the UI, including progress indicators, stage information, and navigation handling based on current orchestrator state.
